problem.display_name: Graded question - Configuring Numerator Groups - Question 1
problem.markdown:
Where is it possible to add a new indicator group for analysis?
>>Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts) <<
( ) A. Nowhere. It is only used for meta-data administration ( ) B. Only in the Annual Report (x) C. In the WHO DQ tool dashboard where that group can be selected ( ) D. Both in the WHO DQ dashboard and the standard DHIS2 dashboard app
[explanation] In the WHO DQ tool dashboard where that group can be selected is the correct answer. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Where is it possible to add a new indicator group for analysis?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts)

choicegroup.choice: A. Nowhere. It is only used for meta-data administration
B. Only in the Annual Report
C. In the WHO DQ tool dashboard where that group can be selected
D. Both in the WHO DQ dashboard and the standard DHIS2 dashboard app

div.p: In the WHO DQ tool dashboard where that group can be selected is the correct answer.
